hero.title: Building the Future with Code and Creativity

services.subtitle: We combine web development and AI engineering to deliver premium, production-ready digital solutions.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: We architect fast, secure, and scalable frontend and backend systems. With solid API design and optimized databases, we build digital foundations that grow with your business.

consulting.title: AI Consulting Steps
consulting.subtitle: We help you identify, design, and execute AI solutions that deliver real value to your business.

step1.title: Initial Consultation
step1.description: Discuss your business needs and challenges to identify high-impact AI opportunities.

step2.title: Analysis & Recommendation
step2.description: We analyze your business processes and provide actionable AI solution recommendations.

step3.title: Planning & Proposal
step3.description: Receive a clear implementation plan with timeline, cost estimation, and execution roadmap.

step4.title: Implementation & Support
step4.description: We support the integration of AI solutions end-to-end, including training and ongoing technical assistance.

hero.title: Digital Systems

about.title: We Are Stelarea
about.description: A digital agency dedicated to simplifying the complex. We combine creative design with smart technology to build solutions that help your business grow naturally.

businessFirst.title: Business-First Approach
businessFirst.description: We don't start with technology; we start with your business goals and bottlenecks. Every line of code serves a specific operational purpose.

beyondHype.title: Beyond the Hype
beyondHype.description: We implement AI and digital tools to solve actual problems, not just to follow trends. Practicality is our priority.

builtForGrowth.title: Built for Growth
builtForGrowth.description: Our solutions are designed to handle your success, scaling effortlessly as you expand from 100 to 1 million users.

partnership.title: Partnership, Not Just Production
partnership.description: We stay invested in the long-term success of the systems we build. We are your technical partner for the long haul.

services.description: We partner with organizations to modernize how they work. We replace manual processes and outdated tools with integrated digital solutions that drive real value.
